text: What do you ask of me?

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Great Queen Spider, we seek to change one of the Vatican rules.

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: The Vatican rules cannot be changed. So saith the Spider

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Go on, Priest Maxi. See if you can convince her.

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Alright, that does it!!! I've had enough!!! You people have completely lost touch with the outside world! You sit in this big room with your Gelgameks and your Queen Spider, and none of it applies to what being a Catholic is all about!!

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: But the Holy Document of Vatican Law states that-

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: To hell with the Holy Document of Vatican Law!!

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: South Park, day. The boys stand in front of Stan's house

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: You guys, you guys!  I took Kyle's twenty dollars down to the bank again, and I got it changed into quarters!

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: So?

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: So now I can dump them into this little pool and swim in them all day long! Yeessss. Kyle's monneey.

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Cartman, there's something I need to tell you.

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: O-hoo, what's that, Kyle?

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: You were totally, one hundred percent right.

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Heh...  what?

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: You won the bet. You were totally accurate about being able to crap out your mouth, and I've just been frustrated because I didn't think of it first. I want you to enjoy that money because... you really impressed me with your insight and... I'm... proud to have you as a friend.

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: You sonofabitch, Kyle!! I hate you!!

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Yeah, the pope is gone!

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Great news, Stan! The Vatican is burning down!

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Score one for us atheists

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Come on, Tweek! We're gonna watch it on TV!

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Vatican City, day. The clergy mill around in the ruins of the Vatican.

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Gone! It's all gone!

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Well, thanks a lot, Father Maxi. You've killed our religion.

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: No I didn't! All that's dead are your stupid laws and rules!  You've forgotten what being a Catholic is all about. This... book. You see, these are just stories.  Stories that are meant to help people in the right direction. Love your neighbor. Be a good person. That's it! And when you start turning the stories into literal translations of hierarchies and power, well... Well, you end up with this.  People are losing faith because they don't see how what you've turned the religion into applies to them! They've lost touch with any idea of any kind of religion, and when they have no mythology to try and live their lives by, well, they just start spewing a bunch of crap out of their mouths!

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: ...What was that last bit?

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Look, I, I'm proud to be a Catholic. But I'm a Catholic in the real world. In today's world! It's time for you all to do that, too. It is time... for change.

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Stan's house, after the telecast

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: He's right, Sharon. We don't have to believe every word of the Bible. They're just stories to help us to live by. We shouldn't toss away the lessons of the Bible just because some assholes in Italy screwed it up.

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: O Randy, I don't wanna put food up my butt anymore.

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Gang, I think maybe we, owe God an apology.

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: Does this mean we have to go to church on Sundays again?

title: RED HOT CATHOLIC LOVE
text: No. It means we get to, son. It means... we get to.
